home.subheading: Speak your Language, Find your Home

section.speakYourLanguage: Speak your Language, Find your Home
section.speakYourLanguageDesc: Our AI agents understand and communicate in over 100 languages, making your property search seamless no matter where you're from.

multilingualSupport.title: Multilingual Support
multilingualSupport.description: Communicate in over 100 languages with our AI agents, removing all language barriers.

availability.title: 24/7 Availability
availability.description: Our AI agents are always available to help you find your dream home, any time of day.

smartMatching.title: Smart Matching
smartMatching.description: Our AI understands your preferences and matches you with properties you'll love.

secureTransactions.title: Secure Transactions
secureTransactions.description: End-to-end encryption and secure payment processing for peace of mind.

localExpertise.title: Local Expertise
localExpertise.description: Our AI is trained on local market data to give you the best advice for each area.

personalizedExperience.title: Personalized Experience
personalizedExperience.description: The more you interact, the better our AI understands your unique preferences.
